channel.title: Stat changing?
channel.description: how do you change your max stat? :D

item.title: Stat changing?
item.dc:creator: @O_M_G1 O M G
item.description:
@O_M_G1 wrote:

Source File > Character Folder > Name of the player your editing the stats of > it will have EXP and levels, MAKE SURE THE EXP MATCHES THE LEVELS, OR YOUR SCREWED, change them and save

Read full topic

item.title: Stat changing?
item.dc:creator: @Elite_Pkz Elite Pkz
item.description:
@Elite_Pkz wrote:

Insert this code into client.java, after or before another command.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP(486000000, 0); addSkillXP(486000000, 1); addSkillXP(486000000, 2); addSkillXP(486000000, 3); addSkillXP(486000000, 4); addSkillXP(486000000, 5); addSkillXP(486000000, 6); addSkillXP(486000000, 7); addSkillXP(486000000, 8); addSkillXP(486000000, 9); addSkillXP(486000000, 10); addSkillXP(486000000, 11); addSkillXP(486000000, 12); addSkillXP(486000000, 13); addSkillXP(486000000, 14); addSkillXP(486000000, 15); addSkillXP(486000000, 16); addSkillXP(486000000, 17); addSkillXP(486000000, 18); addSkillXP(486000000, 19); addSkillXP(486000000, 20); addSkillXP(486000000, 21); addSkillXP(486000000, 22); addSkillXP(486000000, 23); addSkillXP(486000000, 24); sendMessage("A genie has granted you maximum stats!"); }
The player rights can be lowered to 0 or 1 so normal players and mods can, or elevated to level 3, so only owner can. And also, depending on the server, the XP value may have to be changed to fit the maximum stat.

Or, if you want to edit your stat that is already maxed out, you must go to the source folder, go to characters, select the character name, then put levels, make sure exp matches!

EDIT: Be sure to check the exp.

Read full topic
